input.title: High Risk: Key Vaults with Open Network Access (AZ-003)
input.body:
# AZ-003: Key Vaults with Open Network Access

## Description
Multiple Key Vaults have open network access, which is a high security risk.

Affected Resources:
- ai-empire-vault-01
- seobaike-vault

## Recommended Fix
Restrict network access to these Key Vaults using Azure portal or CLI (e.g., az keyvault network-rule add). Requires manual intervention as AI CTO tools are read-only for Azure.

Module: Azure
Level: High

input.title: Medium Risk: AI Services with Public Network Access (AZ-004)
input.body:
# AZ-004: AI Services with Public Network Access

## Description
Multiple AI services have public network access enabled, posing a medium security risk.

Affected Resources:
- ai-empire-openai-australiaeast
- ai-empire-openai-eastus
- ai-empire-openai-japaneast
- ai-empire-openai-southeastasia
- ai-empire-openai-swedencentral
- ai-empire-openai-uksouth
- ai-empire-openai-westeurope
- ai-empire-openai-westus

## Recommended Fix
Disable public network access for these AI services using Azure portal or CLI (e.g., az cognitiveservices account update --public-network-access Disabled). Requires manual intervention as AI CTO tools are read-only for Azure.

Module: Azure
Level: Medium

input.title: High Risk: GitHub Repository is Public (GH-001)
input.body:
# GH-001: Repository is Public

## Description
The GitHub repository is set to public, exposing source code which is a high security risk.

## Recommended Fix
Change the repository visibility to private via GitHub settings. Requires manual intervention as AI CTO does not have tools to modify GitHub repository settings.

Module: GitHub
Level: High
